review.rating: Clean, very new hotel & friendly staff
review.comment_positive: Just like the photos. Extremely clean, modern and comfortable room. Everything feels very new. Beautiful, spacious bathroom with rain shower. Staff was polite and cheerful. They have a safe garage to store your motorbike or bicycle.
review.comment_negative: A little far from any services so recommend to stay here only if you have a bike. Not a negative, but noteworthy that Superior Double Room windows look into the staircase and construction site a couple meters away, so practically no view for this room type. The elevator sound is also a bit too loud.

review.comment_positive:
Newly built hotel, so the facilities are brand new and quite good.
Clean & spacious room, with a balcony.
Lot of parking space.
Water in the bathroom was really strong, it made me enjoy bathing very much!!!
review.comment_negative: Location: the hotel is located in a under-construction area, so there was quite a few light. If you are walking to the beach at night, you may find it troubling to walk on these dark streets. However, once the area is completed, I believe location will no longer be the problem.
